Temel Fikir â€‹

StateGraph â€‹

LangGraph'Ä±n kalbi StateGraph'tÄ±r. Durumu otomatik olarak yÃ¶netir ve dÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼mler arasÄ±nda taÅŸÄ±r:

python
from langgraph.graph import StateGraph, END

workflow = StateGraph(AgentState)

# DÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼m ekle
workflow.add_node("main_agent", main_router_agent)
workflow.add_node("math_expert", math_expert_node)

# BaÅŸlangÄ±Ã§ noktasÄ±
workflow.set_entry_point("main_agent")

# KoÅŸullu kenar
workflow.add_conditional_edges(
    "main_agent",
    route_decision,          # Hangi dÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼me gideceÄŸini dÃ¶ndÃ¼ren fonksiyon
    {
        "math": "math_expert",
        "legal": "legal_expert",
    }
)

# BitiÅŸ kenarÄ±
workflow.add_edge("math_expert", END)

# Graf'Ä± derle
app = workflow.compile()

Ã‡alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rma â€‹

python
result = app.invoke({
    "user_query": "5 * 8 kaÃ§tÄ±r?",
    "intent": "",
    "final_answer": ""
})

print(result["intent"])       # "math"
print(result["final_answer"]) # "40"

Ã–nemli Kavramlar â€‹

invoke vs stream â€‹

python
# TÃ¼m sonucu bekle
result = app.invoke(initial_state)

# AdÄ±m adÄ±m akÄ±ÅŸ (streaming)
for chunk in app.stream(initial_state):
    print(chunk)

DÃ¶ngÃ¼ler (Cycles) â€‹

LangGraph, dÃ¶ngÃ¼leri destekler â€” bir ajan kendi kendini tekrar Ã§aÄŸÄ±rabilir:

python
# Bir dÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼mden aynÄ± dÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼me kenar eklenebilir
workflow.add_conditional_edges(
    "agent",
    should_continue,
    {
        "continue": "agent",  # Geri dÃ¶ner
        "end": END
    }
)

INFO

Projenizde dÃ¶ngÃ¼ yok â€” her ajan bir kez Ã§alÄ±ÅŸÄ±p END'e gidiyor. Bu basit yÃ¶nlendirme mimarisidir.
